pullRequest.title: [BEAM-10603] Fix BCJ termination conditions.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Change-Id: I24eb5a94e1bdafa1833ede0d04c9e2b824417f87
The old logic didn't allow for the BCJ to terminate if cancelled without a trigger. This allows for the BCJ to be cancelled at any time.
